entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then near blizzard. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
